headline.main: New Vatican Figures Show Deficit Narrowed by Half in 2015
headline.print_headline: New Vatican Figures Show Deficit Narrowed by Half in 2015

lead_paragraph: The Vatican has issued new figures showing it narrowed its deficit by half in 2015 to 12.4 million euros ($13 million).
snippet: The Vatican has issued new figures showing it narrowed its deficit by half in 2015 to 12.4 million euros ($13 million)....
